sections.title: Core Idea
sections.text: A dungeon-based action RPG that focuses on replayability through a unique progression system. Players hunt specific enemies to master their drop tables and can reset their character levels to gain permanent skill masteries. This creates a deep progression loop where knowledge and strategy matter more than raw stats.

sections.title: Key Features
sections.text:
• Enemy-specific loot mastery system
• Level reset mechanics for skill progression
• Knowledge-based gameplay
• Strategic character building
• Permanent progression through mastery

sections.title: Implementation Challenges
sections.text: Balancing the loot mastery system to remain engaging across multiple playthroughs without becoming tedious. Ensuring the level reset mechanic feels rewarding rather than punishing. Creating a difficulty curve that accommodates both new and mastered players. Designing enemy encounters that remain interesting even after players have mastered their patterns and drops.
